resources.string: We\'ll need an ID and a selfie to verify your identity and prevent someone else creating an account in your name.
We\'ll just need to verify both sides of your National ID.
We\'ll need a selfie to make sure no one else is creating an account in your name.
Show us the front of your ID
Is the front of your ID readable?
Is the back of your ID readable?
Make sure we can see and read your entire ID.
Make sure the lighting\'s good and we can see you.
App won\'t work without permissions. Please, restart app and give access to the permissions.
Please Connect your phone to Internet
Make sure your device is connected to the internet
ClientId cannot be empty. Please, provide your client id.
Secret key cannot be empty. Please, provide your secret key.
Reference parameter cannot be empty. Please, provide a unique reference.
Make sure the entire front of your ID is in the frame above.
Do you still want to continue with Auto-Capture or capture manually
Show us the back of your ID
Make sure the entire back of your ID is in the frame above.
You\'ve done this before, position your head inside the frame. But, make sure to get rid of any accessories.
Please provide a valid document with all four corners being visible.
Please provide a valid document and hold it still for a while.
Please bring the document closer and place it inside the box.
Please place the face inside the oval.
The face image is blurred, please provide a clear face.
Please bring your face closer and place it inside the oval.
Please look towards the camera and place the face inside the oval.
Please make sure you take clear front and back pictures of your National/Resident ID
Please ensure that the data on the document is clearly visible. That no reflections are seen on the document image, and that the image captured is in good lighting conditions.
Just a moment, the cashews are\nhard at work…
Your documents have been submitted successfully!
Verification results will be forwarded to your merchant
Your request is invalid, please try again!
Your request have been timeout, please try again!
Your request is unauthorized, please try again!
Are you sure you want to cancel the verification process?
